sidequests.title: Take a 20-minute walk
sidequests.description: Go for a brisk walk around your neighborhood. Notice something new you've never seen before.

sidequests.title: 15-minute stretch session
sidequests.description: Do a full body stretch routine. Focus on areas that feel tense.

sidequests.title: 30-minute jog or run
sidequests.description: Head outside for a run. Go at your own pace—it's about moving, not speed.

sidequests.title: 45-minute bike ride
sidequests.description: Hop on a bike and explore a new route. Discover a street or path you've never taken.

sidequests.title: 1-hour yoga flow
sidequests.description: Follow a yoga video or create your own flow. Breathe and move intentionally.

sidequests.title: 90-minute hike
sidequests.description: Find a trail and hike for about an hour and a half. Take in the scenery.

sidequests.title: 2-hour outdoor adventure
sidequests.description: Plan a longer activity—hiking, biking, or a mix. Explore somewhere new.

sidequests.title: 10 jumping jacks every hour
sidequests.description: Set a reminder. Every hour, do 10 jumping jacks. Stay active throughout your day.

sidequests.title: Watch a comedy special
sidequests.description: Find a 20-30 minute comedy clip or special. Laugh out loud.

sidequests.title: Learn a magic trick
sidequests.description: Search YouTube for a simple magic trick. Master it and show someone.

sidequests.title: Dance party for one
sidequests.description: Put on your favorite playlist and dance like nobody's watching for 15 minutes.

sidequests.title: Try a new recipe
sidequests.description: Cook something you've never made before. Bonus: share it with someone.

sidequests.title: Visit a thrift store
sidequests.description: Browse a thrift or vintage shop. Find one weird or wonderful item.

sidequests.title: Build a pillow fort
sidequests.description: Construct the coziest fort you can. Relax inside for 20 minutes.

sidequests.title: Listen to a podcast episode
sidequests.description: Pick an episode on a topic you're curious about. Take a walk while listening.

sidequests.title: Complete a puzzle
sidequests.description: Do a jigsaw, crossword, or Sudoku. Give your brain a fun challenge.

sidequests.title: Call a friend or family member
sidequests.description: Reach out to someone you haven't talked to in a while. Catch up for 15+ minutes.

sidequests.title: Write a letter to someone
sidequests.description: Handwrite a note or letter. Mail it or leave it for someone to find.

sidequests.title: Compliment 3 strangers
sidequests.description: Give a genuine compliment to three people you don't know today.

sidequests.title: Have coffee with someone
sidequests.description: Meet a friend, coworker, or acquaintance for coffee or tea. 30 minutes of connection.

sidequests.title: Join a local meetup or event
sidequests.description: Find an event (game night, trivia, hike) and show up. Meet new people.

sidequests.title: Video call a long-distance friend
sidequests.description: Schedule a video call with someone far away. Catch up for at least 30 minutes.

sidequests.title: Volunteer for an hour
sidequests.description: Find a local opportunity—food bank, shelter, community garden. Give back.

sidequests.title: Strike up a conversation
sidequests.description: Talk to someone new—at a café, park, or store. Just say hi and see where it goes.
